file_content.text: You may want to hurry. The Scourge is getting more recruits every day.
I need to find a way into cell block 923-A.
And I went and told Jarvey he was seeing things. The captain wouldn't be here, I says. Not after besting Nok Drayen.
But here you are!
Name's Amikab. If you just got nicked, you came to the right Bith. I can get you to block 923... for a price.
Tell me what you know, and I'll pay what it's worth.
I'll give you credits.
Just to show I know you're a notch above the scum in here, I won't even haggle.
I'm on the guards' side this time. What kind of perks are you looking for?
I can help you.
Only one thing anyone's looking for--the way off. You get me that, I'll get you the back door to every half-credit gang hideout on Belsavis.
Talk or I blow your brains all over this yard.
Tell me or else!
All right. Back down, killer.
But don't think that attitude will work everywhere. Lots of folks here would be happy to let you grant their death wish.
The Scourge is the gang that took block 923, puffed-up sons of Hutts. They've rerouted the cells' generators to shield themselves. Call the place their "fortress."
Tell me you've got their spare key, and I'll really be impressed.
How do I get in?
Strictly information. Keeps my skin whole.
What kind of surprises can I expect if we go head-to-head?
Tell me about the Scourge.
They're just like every pack of fools who think an open door and some scavenged blasters make them the next Mandalore.
You talking about on- or off-site?
Where are the generators?
The generators are off-site. If you shut them down, you should be able to shoot your way in through the rest.
I'll give you the spot, then we're done here.
I knew you were more brains than brawn. That's it exactly.
You want in without making friends, first you've got to shut down their generators.
There should be men guarding them, but nothing like what you'll be facing once you get inside.
Now we're talking. Where do I find the generators?
Point me at them.
Appreciate it.
Anything else about this place I should know?
Tell me more about Belsavis.
They say the Voidwolf's behind the strike; he's looking to build us into an army. Me, I think he couldn't give a kretch's backside what happens to us.
Let me see your datapad--I'll give you the generator site. They don't give us access to anything with transmission capability.
Once you get in, look for the stockpile. The Scourge stash their weapons up front. You reach 'em before they do, and you're set.
Now let's see the credits. I'm worth my price.
Now keep in mind who helped you. Anything else you need, I'm the man in the know.
Anything you need to know, I got it.
